directions: Cook beans in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Drain. Transfer to bowl of ice water and cool. Drain well. Place in large bowl.
Mix next 5 ingredients in small bowl; stir into beans. Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with parsley and cherry tomatoes.
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds slender green beans, trimmed, cut into 2-inch pieces
title: Green Bean and Cherry Tomato Salad with Herb Dressing
